table.name: vtiger_cases
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cases` ( `casesid` int(11) default NULL, `cases_no` varchar(56) default NULL, `casesname` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`casesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_casescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_casescf` ( `casesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`casesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
